constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 200 (Wednesday, November 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. O'HALLERAN:
H.R. 6007.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 18, section 8 of article 1 of the Constitution
[Page H6371]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the expansion of coverage of vaccines under part B of the Medicare program, and for other purposes.
